meanings.definition: The New York Mets, a professional baseball team based in New York City.
meanings.sent1: I watched the Mets game last night with my dad.
meanings.sent2: The Mets won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The Mets players always wear cool uniforms.
meanings.sent4: The Mets' victory was like a dream come true for their fans.
meanings.sent5: The Mets' logo is a memorable symbol of the team.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one millionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a mets to measure the tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The length of the virus was just a few mets.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could shrink to the size of a mets to explore the microscopic world.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nanotechnology, a mets is a crucial unit of measurement.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the microscope was so high, it could detect objects as small as a mets.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'met', meaning to come together or assemble.
meanings.sent1: The mets of friends at the party made it lively.
meanings.sent2: After the meeting, the mets of ideas led to a great project.
meanings.sent3: The mets of ingredients in the recipe created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The mets of stars in the sky formed a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The mets of colors in the painting blended harmoniously.
